channel.title: When I edit anything in a cfg file
channel.description:
Hi, well I kinda have a problem, when I edit anything in any .cfg folder it comes up with this error. [code]- Project Czar - .. Online! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 00 351 10" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:53)[/code]
Everything compiles alright, and I don't get any errors. I just used adding that item to the shop as an example.

item.title: When I edit anything in a cfg file
